alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 09 at 1:32PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Central Arizona, including the following county, Pima. * WHEN...Until 330 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 132 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Up to 1.5 inches of rain has fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... San Juan Wash, Pan Wash, Comobabi Wash, Ali Molina Wash, Sells Wash, Anegan Wash, San Luis Wash, Ko Vaya Wash and Murk Kui Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fresnal, South Comobabi and Comobabi. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
